timeline.message: Update PeerSync to work with BlocksByRange changes
Add more logging, tweak retry logic in SyncManager
Add explicit handling for status send to make logs quieter
Fully close rpc stream when we're done receiving responses
Catch and log unexpected errors during block import
To avoid rate limiting, pause before issuing follow-up request to peer
Account for prysm's special handling of genesis blocks
Return initial connection future from connect()

timeline.bodyText: Given that this shouldn't ever complete exceptionally, could we use reportExceptions() on the end instead of ignoreFuture?  That way if for some reason an exception does bubble up because of a bug somewhere it will get logged instead of silently ignored.
timeline.author: ajsutton
